model

Interface MusicPlayerModel


  • public interface MusicPlayerModel
    This interface rappresent the model of a music player
    Author:
    Matteo Gabellini

                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Returns:
        the URL of the song
        Throws:

        Parameters:
